Class AccountContactRelationSelector

public inherited sharing class AccountContactRelationSelector

Runs queries on the AccountContactRelation object

Change History

06/19/2021 Initial version.
06/28/2021 New methods: getRelations() and getRelationsWithEmail().
08/10/2021 getRelations(): Add AccountId and ContactId.
11/16/2023 countBlazeBiteAgents(): Count agents related to the given accounts.
06/16/2024 getBlazeBiteAgents(): Return agents related to the given accounts.
